attributes.action: Stop council snoopers entering our homes without our permission irrespective of reason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop council snoopers from entering our homes. Our homes are one place we should be able to restrict anyone from entering without our permission, irrespective of reason, except in the case of a search warrant signed by a magistrate. If councils want details of our homes they should accept our written details.
